text: Kurt Körner (13 May 1912 - 1945) was a German ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. He was killed in action during World War II. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1945 deaths Category:German male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Germany Category:Ski jumpers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Klingenthal Category:German military personnel killed in World War II
title: Kurt Körner
